name: Serino - Royale Maduro - BelicosoÂ
additionalNotes: Satisfy your hankering for boutique brands with Serino Royale Maduro. An oily Ecuador Habano wrapper is packed with top-quality, handcrafted Nicaraguan long-filler tobaccos in a handful of perfectly balanced shapes. Notes of coffee, cedar and almonds create a mouthwatering, medium to full-bodied profile. Impress your cigar-smoking pals with the silky richness and deep finish Serino Royale Maduro offers.
